name: Trinity: Life Beyond The Screen DEMO
name_original: Trinity: Life Beyond The Screen DEMO
description:
Trinity: Life Beyond The Screen is an Otome Dating Simulator taking place in a fictional fantasy MMORPG . Choose your own path and discover a brand new world and characters waiting there just for you.


It's the early 2000's, you've just come home from a long tiring day, you just wish life could be simpler, more relaxing, maybe even a fresh start.. That's when you meet Trinity Online a Japanese Anime MMORPG and a new path for you opens up..

Discover a brand new virtual world! Join hunts and raids, journey across the lands doing fetchquests anywhere you want, carve your own path, even become a legendary player! and most important of all.. meet new people, forge friendships, create rivalries and who knows what else more..?  There is only one way to know.. why don't you join it and see it for yourself?

Trinity: LBTS is a game where choices are important and open up new paths, this is not a game which you should play only one time.
Trinity online is a world inspired by MMORPGS from the past, a nostalgic world based on our experiences on this kind of games, every artistic, musical and writing decision has been made with this compromise in mind and it's one of it's biggest appeals.

◇Female protagonist.
◇3 Love Interests.
◇Multiple choice paths
◇Unlockable Image Gallery
◇Replayability
